officialTitle: Dawn Simulation as a Passive Countermeasure to Postural Hypotension in Healthy Older Adults
inclusionCriteria:
* History of falls or dizziness at exit from bed in the morning (at least two incidents in the past year)
* At least 20/200 corrected visual acuity
* Stable health
* Normal hearing
* Must have minimum age of 55 Years
* Must have maximum age of 85 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Regular cigarette smoker
* Alcohol abuse
* Drug abuse
